verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We'll sing a new song
Of joyful triumph
For we see the government
Of God in our lives
We'll sing a new song
Of glorious triumph
For we see the government
Of God in our lives

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For He is crowned
God of creation
Crowned
Lord of the whole world
Crowned
Ruling all nations now

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yes He is crowned
God of creation
Crowned
Lord of the whole world
Crowned
Ruling all nations now
